text: The women's 400 metres event at the 1984 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on 3 and 4 March.Results (p. 499) ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Taťána Kocembová '''' |Erika Rossi '''' |Rositsa Stamenova '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 of each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
